dialog: I seek a pair of enchanted footwear.
Would thee prefer stilettos or flat-soled shoes?
High heels, if you please. I aim to don them for formal gatherings.
Greetings, Jim. Dost thou have a moment to spare?
Certainly, what brings you to me?
A number of us are forming a quidditch team. Would thou like to join us?
I'm afraid I have little knowledge of the sport, as quidditch is not as popular in my homeland.
Fear not, we shall guide thee.
Is it similar to the game of Muggle football?
Nay, it is more akin to hockey, except the ball is larger and nary a stick is employed.
I shall visit and observe a match one day, to better understand the sport.
A wise choice. I'm sure you'll find it to your liking, given a chance.
Do you recall what the movie rating system signifies?
Indeed, G is for General Audiences, PG signifies Parental Guidance is recommended, R is restricted to those under 18 years of age, and X indicates explicit content.
Do people still take heed of those classifications?
Do you remember the days when children were not permitted to attend PG-rated movies without a guardian?
I recall that X-rated films were scarce to come by.
Nowadays, with video rentals, it is a matter of personal discretion.
Aye, I've not seen theaters turn away patrons due to age restrictions in quite some time.
We are now left to make our own decisions about what we do and do not wish to view.
